definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: The dispute over elegance and commonplace is one focus in the history of modern Chinese novels.
sentences.chinese: 雅俗論爭，是中國現代小說史的中心話題之一。

sentences.english: It is a vexed question on the controversy of pessimism of history theory and optimism of history theory.
sentences.chinese: 歷史悲樂論的論爭，是從古至今一直爭論不休的問題。

sentences.english: The discussion of public language in 1934 has historical dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 1934年的大衆語論爭，非常具有歷史的戲劇性。

sentences.english: Second, the controversy persons had a theoretic exploration to the cultural united front.
sentences.chinese: 其次，論爭對文化統一戰線進行了理論探索。

sentences.english: The controversy has brought the tremendous influence to Lu Xun s heart way course for" revolutionary literature".
sentences.chinese: “革命文學”論爭給魯迅的心路歷程帶來了巨大影響。

definition: lit. floating wine goblets on a stream/the origin (of some phenomenon)
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
a Yuan dynasty form of musical comedy
